title: I RECONNECTED AND MY TEAM STILL REMADE
body: my computer was laoding slwo for some reason so i reconnected after every one else, but my team still remade even tho tho i typed and move around to show that i had reconnected, but they still remade and i lost 18 lp, its in my match history. i had the same issue a few months prior and i told you guys and riot prevented my next loss i ask that ypu look into this pls

replies.body: It sounds like you were gone for long enough to trigger /remake, which would count as a loss.  There's no way to give back LP or adjust your ranked stats, but I can help with troubleshooting.  If this is an issue that's coming back up, let me know what's happening exactly and I'd be happy to dig into that.
